reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

description.narrative: The bridging period is meant for enabling TNRF to fully gain back to grounds. The proposed support is only meant for the bridging period during which TNRF will strive to raise additional funds in a more revised way.Thus the main aim of this funding proposa l is to enable TNRF secure core funding from January 2014 to implement its strategy.TNRF is expected to invest in interventions that will contribute to institutional sustainability. they include, Fundraising for the proposals of three strategic priorities: Community based natural Resource management Land Based Investments and Climate ChangeTNRF will review its internal financial regulations and procurement guidelines to reflect TNRF's ideal conditionsTNRF will continue to implement recommendations from the Financial Management Assessment conducted in August 2012TNRF will implement research excellence strategy to ensure quality control for long term strategyTNRF will develop and finalise information technology policy also continue to network bring members and other key stakeholders together for the goal of improving knowledge.Expected results include: robust financial and procurement systems established, funding sources identified and secured for existing period, research excellence improved and quality of com missioned research improved.The requested amount is for contributions to salaries
